entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [release/9.0] HostActivation installer tests are expecting 9.0.0 but getting 9.0.0-ci in PRs #108994
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose NullExternalScopeProvider and NullScope #108993
    Future
  • When using the voice playback API provided by Microsoft, I cannot get all the installed voice packets in the system #108991
  • SOAP Service Need To Accept Content-Type Of "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". #108989
  • JIT Focus Area for .NET 10 #108988
    10.0.0
  • CMake Error: 'arm64' is an unsupported architecture #108987
  • Dataset - project targeting .net framework 4.8 and .net 8 - DiagnosticId error in auto generated code in dataset #108986
  • Icmp only triggers when socket is disposed #108984
  • NetworkInterface.GetIPProperties() does not report MulticastAddresses for Android Always #108983
  • [Android] System.TypeInitializationException on app startup #108979
  • .NET 9, ILC reports trimmer warnings for `k__BackingField` for auto-properties #108978
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] Measure browser-bench performance with O3 #108976
    10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Test build doesn't make crossgen2 executable in RISC-V. #108973
  • [Wasm][net9] MSBuild `EmscriptenVersion` is still 3.1.34 #108972
  • [NET9] [REGRESSION] Gmail API fail with TieredCompilation disabled #108969
  • Requesting a backport of #100774 into .NET 8 #108966
  • [Mono] ves_icall_RuntimeType_GetInterfaces generates an extra Implemented Interface #108964
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: SciMark2.kernel Regression on 10/15/2024 8:19:02 AM #108980
  • On Linux, `System.Diagnostics.Process.StartTime` is not stable #108959
  • .NET 9 iOS / HybridGlobalization: currency symbols / currency names not available #108958
    10.0.0
  • [WASM] UnsafeAccessor doesn't work in some circumstances. #108957
  • Build crash using brew clang 19 on m3 #108956

Closed

  • .NET - `System.Text.Json.Schema.JsonSchemaExporter` failing to include `required` property #109000
  • Test failure: profiler/transitions/transitions/transitions.cmd #108829
    10.0.0
  • LINQ Sum extension returns 0 instead of null #108985
  • Error message for missing service registration is misleading when using AddHttpClient<> #104386
    Future
  • Consider adding JsonDocument.TryParse() #108974
  • `DebuggerTests` other than `WasmTestOnChrome` timeouts in CI #108921
  • Memory leak in HttpClient #108741
  • [API Proposal]: Volatile barrier APIs #98837
    Future
  • Intermittent AccessViolation and NullReference exceptions in reflection-based JsonSerializer #108926
  • OverloadResolutionPriority does not work for extension methods accross different classes #108960
  • Proposal: Add new property for getting process path #14319

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Ignore *.pp files in .gitignore #109003
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Remove *.pp file #108998
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Synthesize assembly names by default for ilproj-based tests #108997
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Delete IL verification failure helpers in importer #108996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Make System.Formats.Asn1 triple slash documentation the source of truth #108995
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Unify dotnet/runtime on using Arcade -publish #108990
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Enable few tests #108977
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Switch to Azure Linux VM #108967
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update remarks for `IsRealNumber` #108965
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Include loongarch64 in supported nativeaot RIDs. #108962
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Add security design docs for Dictionary, HashCode, and StringComparer #108864
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Ignore *.pp files in .gitignore #109001
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move init class helpers to managed code #108029
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108952
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make System.Formats.Asn1 triple slash documentation the source of truth #108982
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #108870
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0] Couple minor docs updates #108453
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Allow the cdac build tool to roll forward to whatever SDK is available (prerelease or otherwise) #108946
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix HostApiInvokerApp test app setting DllImportResolver for hostfxr #108954
    area-Host
  • Improve error message for TypedHttpClient missing constructor parameter #108670
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Assign VN for COMMA in gtWrapWithSideEffects #108955
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] ExecutionManager contract and RangeSectionMap lookup unit tests #108685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Use loop-aware RPO for initial block layout #108903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement volatile barrier APIs #107843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix JIT refusing to inline methods accessing static readonly arrays #108953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't run trim-unfriendly ConcurrentDictionary test #108925
    area-System.Collections
  • 2 accounting fixes #108880
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Restructure JSImport/JSExport generators to share more code and utilize more Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration shared code #107769
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Simplify making IL base JIT Helpers #108349
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [wasi] Disable build in .NET 9 #108877
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Break up try regions in `Compiler::fgMoveColdBlocks`, and fix contiguity later #108914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2563198 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Clean up in importervectorization.cpp #108818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Refine assert for RMW check in crc32 codegen #108750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.Net Stress Tests Improvements 2 #108703
    area-System.Net
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove ldsfld quirk #108606
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Use `BitVec` with `bbPostorderNum` key to track visited blocks during value numbering #108943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] testing 4GB #108701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [wasi] Include version error message when missing WASI SDK #107599
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [browser] update incorrect references #108352
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Do not use link flags for bitcode compilation #108846
    area-Build-mono
  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile instead of USERPROFILE #108559
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [wasm] stop using mmap/munmap #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support dotnet watch launching the URL with the query string in it #44262
  • CTRL+R will restart entiner process even though the option to restart mentions the single application that was changed #44261
    9.0.2xx
  • Exception when changing files using dotnet watch with hot reload in Aspire #44260
    9.0.2xx
  • Dotnet watch pops browser and asks for auth token, but token is never printed to the console #44259
    9.0.2xx

Closed

  • Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41564
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24474.11] paint.netcore build with errors about elements from Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET are not found #43707
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24474.11] paint.netcore build with error "Missing partial modifier on declaration of type 'AffineTransform2DEffect3'; another partial declaration of this type exists" #43746
  • A way to centrally manage transitive dependencies? #44282
  • [NETSDKE2E]Warning "NU1903: Package 'System.Text.Json' 6.0.0 has a known high severity vulnerability, https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8g4q-xg66-9fp4" displays after creating MStest project in CLI. #44048
  • VSTS/ADO dotnet test step doesn't build NuGet package #9749
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Continue printing out redirected process output after we detect browser launch URL. #44290
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Enable is shipping package in the installer redist to stabilize branding of the installers #44289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create MSBuildSdkResolver VS package in join point #44288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable sourcebuild repo leg #44286
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44284
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dotnet test integration #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Remove manual home variable lookup #44266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add a -sign switch and enable signing for some legs #44207
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make sure the quality is serialized as culture invariant #44232
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve error message for missing artifact files #44206
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] [Containers] Fix insecure registry handling to use the correct port for the HTTP protocol #44234
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.11
  • Fix NetRuntimeBlobVersion #44281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fine tune first join point and VMR support for it #44153
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    Area-Tools, 9.0.2xx
  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2563273 #44252
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Containers] Fix insecure registry handling to use the correct port for the HTTP protocol #44235
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 9.0.0
  • Javiercn/replace swa globbing #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Workloads: Support VS component IDs #44198
    DO NOT MERGE
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44243
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Compromise design for extensions #8519

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test plan for "null-conditional assignment" #75554
  • Action `Convert to full property` generates erroneous code for semi-auto properties #75547
  • `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function seems incorrect #75543

Closed

  • IntelliCode suggestion stuck and never goes away #75408
  • IDE0001: False Positive for default primary constructor #75026
    Backlog
  • Handling of infinite collection initialization chains could be unified #75024
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Language Feature Status.md #75555
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revise expression parsing #75553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Dispose of ITextDocument(s) when closing preview view #75551
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not lex `..` as a single DotDotToken #75549
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ClrOnly condition is not working on mono #75548
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Access services on Solution rather than workspace in Razor cohost (Roslyn OOP) scenarios #75545
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75541
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Disable retaining PR val builds #75552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add ETW events when ALCs are created or disposed #75550
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove references to torn analyzers #75533
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Speculative changes to PrimaryConstructorBaseTypeSyntax #75546
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add more first-class Span tests #75414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types, Next
  • Unify collection expression cycle handling #75464
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move `#if NET` directives forward #75500
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove comment for Obsolete on Index or Range #75531
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75542
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Platform documentation #75540
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Change commit to async when enter is pressed #75335
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: nullable analysis of spread element expression #74686
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.12
  • Migrate Codelens provider to .NET #74321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run binary SDL once on all artifacts #75502
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution for expression tree conversion #75490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Platform - Mono CoreClr
  • Fix incremental parsing error with dot-dot tokens. #75532
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • [WIP] Pass `runningProject` to `GetUpdateAsync` and get projectToRebuild and projectToRestart back #75503
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide information diagnostic when `public partial class Program { }` declaration is found in code #58488
  • PaginationState Issue - Current implementation doesn't always refresh the paginators UI on the page #58487
  • components-reconnect-modal appears underneath <dialog> elements #58486
    Backlog
  • SignalR callbacks working on net7.0, not on net8.0 #58485
  • Running `.\eng\build.cmd` results in error when building repository #58484
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #58483
  • New Blazor Web Application, navigate to the server project's component auto display "Not Found". #58480

Closed

  • OIDC middleware will not use forwarded headers in challenge construction #58455
  • Remove trimming tests workaround for runtime bug #57846
    9.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Provide analyzer for removing unneeded public partial class Program #58482
    analyzer, feature-mvc-testing, area-minimal
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to latest released. #58481
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Unquarantine StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #58368
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Add scope for internal npm packages #58476
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Revert trimming test workarounds #58272
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    analyzer, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Failed resolution of: Landroidx/activity/OnBackPressedDispatcher$Api34Impl$createOnBackAnimationCallback$1; after updating to 8.0.91 from 8.0.71 #25360
  • First debug #25358
  • System.IndexOutOfRangeException: IItemsViewSource is empty #25357
  • Hyper v activation #25354
  • Pan Gesture Stops Working in .NET MAUI After Pinch Gesture #25342
  • [Windows] App based on FlyoutPage uses incorrect title bar colours when system is set to Dark theme and app set to Light theme - illegible content #25341
  • Blazor Hybrid templates have an empty title bar #25337

Closed

  • Fix the catalyst FlyoutItem templates to match iOS #25057
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Border mapping should perform better #24843
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Q: After SDK update and workload update, microsoft.net.sdk.maui is not 8.0.92 #25333
  • Toolbar Above Keyboard Not Visible in Entry on iOS Platform #25147
  • iOS 12.4.4 - ENTRY control | Arg_NullReferenceException | at TextFieldExtensions.GetClearButtonTintImage #19748
    Backlog
  • Scrollview content is not render properly when the 'Don't keep activities' setting is enabled. #25343
  • iOS simulator does not launch #25301

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Reset ListView ScrolledEventArgs.ScrollY when ItemsSource changes #25362
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-listview
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [net9.0] Fix CV2 handler and uitests fixes #25361
  • [XC] Add file info to exception reports #25359
  • [nuget-msi-convert] Do not use new VS component IDs #25355
  • [UITest] Remove the bottom section of iOS UITest (#24586) #25353
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] compile StaticResource w/ generics #25352
  • [main] Make main net9 #25351
  • [Testing] Refactor ported Xamarin.UITest tests #25350
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Updates for ASPNET GA branding #25348
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Testing] More ignore attributes for UITests #25345
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement ContextMenu UITest extension methods #25340
    area-testing
  • [iOS] Fix for TextDecorations not updating after modifying Label text #25339
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Propagate any Page.Title to the window, not just for Shell #25338
    area-templates, area-controls-window

Merged

  • Fix Colors Namespace #25356
  • Speed-up Border rendering by avoiding useless pass during size allocation #24844
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, t/perf
  • Update .NET MAUI template with .NET 9 hovercraft bot 🤖 #25334
    area-templates
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Build arcade net9 on GA branch #25336
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Move ControlGallery XF tests to subfolder #25317
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests, testing-reenable

Updated

  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • Improve performance of rendering `DatePicker` #24948
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Run device tests arm #25331
    do-not-merge
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Re-enable tests #25268
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Propagate x:DataType from parent scope to "standalone bindings" #25295
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Fix support for x:TypeArguments on root node #25287
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] disable AOT warning on InitComp #25297
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [X] inherit DataType based on attribute #25296
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [housekeeping] Update & Consolidate Appium + driver versions #25286
  • [net9.0] Merge main net9.0 #25252
  • Revert PR #23052 behavior under new app context switch #25324
    do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 8 SR10
  • Make Style nullable #25230
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Fix deprecated API usage for embedded fonts on iOS/Catalyst 18.0+ #25055
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Fix passing message arguments to BuildException when logging warning as error #25326
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR1
  • Merge sr9 into net9 ga #25265
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Report XC0025 as an error only in strict compilation mode #25298
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Add services.AddHybridWebViewDeveloperTools() extension to enable browser dev tools #25330
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • [ios,tests] Fix iOS Header with Group #25157
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview
  • Background gradients fixes #25194
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu
  • [Android] Fix ImageButton Padding the third #25223
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Avoid bubbling up invalidation event on new layouts #25291
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures
  • [Testing] More UITests extension methods using an IQuery as parameter #25177
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement Pan method to UITest extension methods #25312
    area-testing
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Efbundle.exe doesn't automatically exit #34930
  • Column treated as nullable if its name is <Entity>Id #34928

Closed

  • EF9 Cosmos RC2: .Where cannot be used with Enum conversion anymore on partition keys #34911
    9.0.0
  • JSON serialised null values cause JsonCollectionReaderWriter to throw and conversion is not applied #34881
  • re-enable stable package warning #34914
    9.0.0
  • EF Core shadow properties incurs a 255 column limitation #34931

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable flow to release/8.0-staging and release/9.0-staging #34933
